77479.summary: Some customers in Christina Lake are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77479.title: May 30 - Christina Lake | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

77483.summary: Some customers will be unable to contact us using our Toll Free Numbers at this time. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
